title: Bug 23267[Import/Export] Import Project should have a default folder
description: Bug 23267[Import/Export] Import Project should have a default folder
OB: When importing an existing Eclipse project on XP and clicking the Browse button, the dialog does not have a good default folder.
EB: When importing an existing Eclipse project on XP and clicking the Browse button, the dialog should have a default folder that is appropriate for importing projects.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open Eclipse on XP. 
2. Go to the Import/Export menu. 
3. Select the Import option. 
4. Choose the 'Project' option from the import source. 
5. Click on the Browse button. 
6. Observe that the dialog opens without a good default folder.
